member.summary: Returns JSON string of connection string properties.

member.returns: Returns JSON string with connection string properties. If an error is detected, it returns the error text.

member.returns: Returns JSON with сonnection string. If an error is detected, it returns the error text.

member.summary: Returns the list of connected tables by connection type and connection string

member.returns: Returns JSON with connected tables

member.summary: Returns the list of connection types

member.remarks: The interface may change over time

member.name: M:FastReport.Web.Services.IDesignerUtilsService.GetMSChartTemplateXML(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for a template by name and returns an XML string with that template
member.param: Name of the template. Like Blue, Black, etc.
member.returns: Returns the XML string with the MsChart template. If the template is not found, it returns null

member.name: M:FastReport.Web.Services.IDesignerUtilsService.GetPropertiesJSON(System.String)
member.summary: Returns JSON string of connection string properties.
member.param: The FastReport component whose properties you want to get. Like TextObject, PictureObject etc.
member.returns: Returns JSON string with FastReport component properties. If the component is not found - returns null

member.name: M:FastReport.Web.Services.IDesignerUtilsService.GetFunctions(FastReport.Report)
member.summary: Retrieves the report functions and returns them to string
member.param: Report, the functions of which are to be obtained
member.returns: Returns a string with the report functions

member.name: T:FastReport.Web.Services.IExportsService
member.summary: Interface for using the export service. Allows you to export a report and get the export settings window.
member.remarks: The interface may change over time

member.name: M:FastReport.Web.Services.IExportsService.ExportReport(FastReport.Web.WebReport,System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}[],System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Exports the report in a specified format with specified parameters and returns an array of bytes - the exported report file
member.param: The FastReport component whose properties you want to get. Like TextObject, PictureObject etc.
member.returns: Returns an array of bytes - the exported report. Returns null if there is an error.

member.name: M:FastReport.Web.Services.IExportsService.GetExportSettings(FastReport.Web.WebReport,System.String)
member.summary: Searches the settings window by format name and returns an HTML string with a modal settings container.
member.param: Report, for which the export settings are using
member.returns: Returns an HTML string with the export settings container of the selected format. If the format is not found, it returns an empty string.

member.name: T:FastReport.Web.Services.IPrintService
member.summary: Interface for printing the report.
member.remarks: The interface may change over time

member.name: M:FastReport.Web.Services.IPrintService.PrintReport(FastReport.Web.WebReport,System.String)
member.summary: Prints report
member.returns: Returns an array of bytes depending on the print mode. File to print from browser if print mode is "html" and pdf file if print mode is "pdf"
